personal.description: Designing AI systems that connect security, language, and intelligence to solve real-world problems. about: I am a passionate Computer Science student with strong experience in Machine Learning, Deep Learning, and LLM Security. My journey spans both professional roles and community projects — from building red-teaming pipelines for chatbots to creating multilingual speech translation systems for global audiences.

I enjoy collaborating across disciplines and thrive in solving complex problems at the intersection of AI, security, and scalable system design. Whether in research teams or volunteering with mission-driven organizations, I value diverse perspectives that lead to impactful solutions.

Beyond academics, I am motivated by the real-world impact of technology — from AI systems that enhance accessibility to secure frameworks that make applications more resilient. With a focus on continuous learning, I aspire to build systems that are not only technically robust but also meaningful to society.

experiences.title: AI Researcher
experiences.description: Led development of an automated red-teaming framework for AI chatbots using Llama-3.1 and Phi-3.5 Mini. Created synthetic data generation pipelines aligned with OWASP top 10 LLM attacks to strengthen security testing. Designed a vulnerability assessment system with a 5-point severity grading scale using fine-tuned LLMs, significantly reducing man-hours for pentesters. Worked extensively with Open-source LLM models, HuggingFace, Streamlit, Python (FastAPI).

experiences.title: Machine Learning Intern
experiences.description: Developed an AI-based music generator integrating facial expression, text, and voice sentiment analysis to create personalized music via Meta's MusicGen. Implemented multiprocessing pipelines reducing response latency by 20%, and achieved 84% accuracy in mood-based predictions for 50+ pilot users. Gained hands-on experience with multimodal AI systems, real-time optimizations, and user-centric design.

experiences.title: Machine Learning Intern
experiences.description: Built a custom OCR model with 87% accuracy for extracting handwritten text and tick marks from survey forms. Enhanced performance using targeted data augmentation and region-specific labeling. Automated a loan form processing pipeline to generate analytics-ready data for insurance assessments, streamlining workflows for financial analysis.

projects.title: Multilingual Speech Translation System
projects.description: Built a speeach recognitio pipeline using NVIDIA NeMo and OpenAI Whisper, fine-tuned for Gujarati (a low-resource language). Developed translation workflows to render spiritual discourses into 8 languages in the original speaker’s voice, reaching 1.2M+ subscribers across 191 countries. Preprocessed a large dataset using voice activity detection and forced alignment pipelines. Implemented semantic evaluation metrics with LLMs to improve translation quality.

projects.title: Advanced RAG Framework
projects.description: Designed a Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) system for multilingual chatbot recommendations. Implemented a two-step retrieval process combining summarization and smart chunking, improving both accuracy and latency. Optimized for diverse formats — PDFs, websites, audio, and video — enabling personalized and scalable knowledge delivery.

projects.title: Efficient Waste Management System
projects.description: Led a team of 3 to develop an AI-driven waste categorization system for Ahmedabad. Fine-tuned YOLOv8 to classify waste, achieving 80% accuracy. Addressed distribution shift by curating a localized dataset of Indian waste patterns. Applied data mining to optimize waste collection routes and recycling processes, contributing to sustainable city management.

projects.title: Face Recognition System
projects.description: Developed and deployed a face recognition system optimized for Indian faces, leveraging a ResNet backbone with triplet loss. Deployed across multiple clubs in Ahmedabad, impacting 8,000+ users. Open-sourced as a Python package, enabling developers to train, fine-tune, and evaluate Siamese-based models easily.

projects.title: Custom Object Detection System with TensorFlow.js and Firebase
projects.description: Developed a custom object detection system using Pretrained Effecientnet model using tensorflow, converted to TensorFlow.js for real-time deployment on a React website. Integrated Firebase for secure login authentication and displayed real-time object counts on a dynamic dashboard.
